name: py-reportlab
description:
The ReportLab Toolkit. An Open Source Python library for generating PDFs
and graphics.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-cnvkit
dependent_to.description: Copy number variation toolkit for high-throughput sequencing.

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.
